title: MD
biography: Gaddam Prasad Kumar is an Indian politician currently serving as the 3rd Speaker of the Telangana Legislative Assembly since 2023. He represents Vikarabad in the Telangana Legislative Assembly. He is a former Member of Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly. He belongs to Indian National Congress.
aiSummary: G. Prasad is a structural heart intervention specialist with an H-index of 103 at Cardiology (Member). Has been published in Science, New England Journal of Medicine, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
